HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Doručení zásilky v rámci ČR následující pracovní dny. Maximální doba doručení je do 10 pracovních dní. Průměrná doba doručení je 3,1 dne.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: Recepce centrály: Klenoty Aurum s.r.o., U Libeňského Pivovaru 10, 180 28 Praha 8 - Libeň (PO-PÁ 9:00 - 17:00)

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The store offers home delivery and personal pickup. PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by PPL. PRICING: PPL delivery costs 110 Kč. Personal pickup at the company's headquarters is free. A cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of 50 Kč applies. No free shipping threshold is mentioned. DELIVERY TIME: PPL delivery is stated as the next business day, but can take up to 10 business days depending on product availability. NOTABLE FEATURES: The only available pickup point is the company's headquarters in Prague 8, available on weekdays. No parcel shop, parcel locker, or standard in-store pickup options are offered. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented on a single, clear page. However, it is very basic, lacking details on free shipping, and offers a very limited range of delivery methods, with no options for pickup outside of their central office.
